item.title: Euro zone inflation holds steady at higher-than-expected 2% in July
item.description: Economists polled by Reuters had expected the figure to hit 1.9%.

item.title: Trump rejigs tariff rates ahead of deadline, levies 40% duties on all transshipped goods
item.description: All goods that are considered to have been transshipped to avoid applicable duties will be subject to an additional 40% tariff, according to the White...

item.title: German inflation dips to cooler-than-expected 1.8% in July
item.description: Economists polled by Reuters had expected inflation to ease to 1.9%.

item.title: The Fed is unlikely to cut rates Wednesday, but this meeting is packed with intrigue
item.description: Considering nothing is likely to happen when it comes to major policy decisions, the meeting promises several fascinating subplots.

item.title: Private company hiring bounced back with a 104,000 increase in July, ADP says
item.description: Payrolls rose by a seasonally adjusted 104,000 for the month, reversing a loss of 23,000 in June.
